name: Prime Time Lacrosse Luxury Lite
desc: This luxurious and spacious RV is perfect for a longer stay with family or friends. It features a large queen-size bed suite and a bunkhouse that’s as big as a second bedroom, making it ideal for accommodating multiple adults. The RV also comes equipped with an outdoor prep area, allowing you to enjoy outdoor activities with your friends and co-workers. And the best part? This RV is available at a super low rate! Don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity and reserve it now before it’s too late!
